extract_embedding.description: Extract high-dimensional embeddings from RNA sequences using the Uni-RNA pre-training model. These embeddings capture rich semantic information about RNA sequences and can be used for downstream analysis and machine learning tasks.

rna_ss.description: Accelerate your scientific research with RNA secondary structure prediction tools based on the Uni-RNA pre-training model. We have trained our model on various datasets, including our Uni-RNA datasets and the RNAStralign dataset for your selection and evaluation.

utr.description: Use the Uni-RNA pre-training model to predict the mean ribosomal loading of mRNA's 5'UTR, aiding in obtaining functionally superior mRNA for scientific research and pharmaceutical development.

apa.description: Predict alternative polyadenylation (APA) sites in RNA sequences using the Uni-RNA pre-training model. APA is a crucial post-transcriptional regulation mechanism that affects mRNA stability, localization, and translation efficiency.

m6a.description: Use the Uni-RNA pre-training model to identify potential methylation modification sites, enhancing your research into RNA functions in the presence of extensive modifications.

lncrna_sublocalization.description: Long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) play a crucial role in the regulatory network of RNA functions. Using the Uni-RNA pre-training model, we efficiently and accurately predict the potential localization of lncRNAs within cells and extract important motifs through the model's attention scores.
